TopicTitle: How do I move around my kerbals?

Articles.Content: I noticed in many youtube videos that the kerbal;s have some sort of propulsion on them to help them move around in space. How do I use this?

During EVA you can press 'R' and it enables their propulsion system.

Hope this helps!

"R" to activate EVApack.

SHIFT to go up.

CTRL to go down.

WASD for moving around.
thank you so much guize. Cabn i refil their little jetpacks?

thank you so much guize. Cabn i refil their little jetpacks?

Yes. Get them back in the capsule and they will refuel instantly.

Be careful when you're doing that on the mun or minmus
